name: Life (Stack Computer)
overview: A lightpen game. Form the membranes of cells in the shape of your choice by repeatedly touching the screen with the light pen. After touching Delete you can remove unwanted cells from the screen by touching them with the pen. When you are satisfied with your colony, start the program by touching Go with the pen. The colony then develops and will expand or contract, depending on whether the individual cells thrive or die to their conditions of population.
